sources.title: Dancing Pirate
sources.description: A dancing instructor is kidnapped by pirates, and manages to escape in a charming little Mexican village.

sources.title: Dancing Pirate (1936)
sources.description: Jonathan Pride is a mild-mannered dance instructor in 1820 Boston. En route to visit relatives, Jonathan is shanghaied by a band of zany pirates and forced to work as a galley boy. When the pirate vessel arrives at the port of Las Palomas, Jonathan, clad in buccaneer's garb, makes his escape. Everyone in Las Palomas, including Governor Alcalde (Frank Morgan) and fetching senorita Serafina (Steffi Duna), assumes that Jonathan is the pirate chieftain, leading to a series of typical comic-opera complications. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dancing-pirate-1936/

sources.title: Dancing Pirate (1936)Adventure, Comedy, Music Full Length Movie
sources.description:
The story of a Boston dance teacher who gets shanghaied by buccaneers who might make his next steps be off the plank!
Director: Lloyd Corrigan
Writers: Ray Harris (screenplay), Francis Edward Faragoh (screenplay)
Stars: Charles Collins, Frank Morgan, Steffi Duna 
Genres: Classics,
